page.title: 04Schools in Witney.
page.content: In Witney there are some playgroups and there are 6 Primary Schools. They are Witney county primary school, Blake school, Cogges, Batt's School,Tower Hill School, Queen's Dyke School,and our Lady of Lourdes,a Roman Catholic school.There are two comprehensive Schools.They are Wood Green and Henry Box which are both the same size. The people who go to Batt's school go on to Henry Box and those who go to The Blake School transfer to Wood Green.When secondary age children reach their sixth year they can go on to a College of Further Eucation such as Witney Technical College.
